mqtt_demo_basic_tls
(application)
Subscribe to Topic
Publish to Topic + Receive Incoming Publish (QoS 2)
Unsubscribe From Topic
ESTABLISH TLS SESSION WITH SERVER CREDENTIALS (OPENSSL)
Unsubscribe From Topics

Subscribe to Topic
Publish to Topic + Receive Incoming Publish (QoS 1)
Unsubscribe From Topic
Subscribe to Topic
Publish to Topic + Receive Incoming Publish (QoS 0)
Unsubscribe From Topic
SEND CONNECT TO MQTT BROKER

Serialize Connect Packet
MQTT_GetConnectPacketSize & MQTT_SerializeConnect

Deserialize Response
(MQTT_GetIncomingPacketTypeAndLength
& MQTT_DeserializeAck)
SEND DISCONNECT PACKET

Serialize Disconnect Packet
(MQTT_GetDisconnectPacketSize
& MQTT_SerializeDisconnect)
Subscribe to Topic
Publish to Topic + Keep Alive Loop (QoS 0)
Unsubscribe From Topic

Serialize PUBLISH or PINGREQ
(alternate every iteration)
(MQTT_Get(Publish/Pingreq)PacketSize
& MQTT_Serialize(Publish/Pingreq))

if globalSubAckStatus == false, 
 send PINGREQ and retry
using exponential
backoff strategy

Process + receive incoming packet
MQTT_GetIncomingPacketTypeAndLength

Process + receive incoming packet
MQTT_GetIncomingPacketTypeAndLength
